title: Rode Hard
description: GAY BDSM EROTICA. In this fifth book of his transformation from alpha hottie into leatherman Jake Heller's personal slave boy, 25-year-old Lucas Devero learns that being Jake's boy means not just serving the studly leatherman, but also anyone Jake orders him to. By the end, Lucas's new status as Jake's boy takes over every aspect of his life.
author: S.F. Tanner
